thread.title: `Successful` Rihanna admits to feeling `unsafe` in success
thread.title_full: `Successful` Rihanna admits to feeling `unsafe` in success - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: `Successful` Rihanna admits to feeling `unsafe` in success
text:
*Washington D.C., Oct. 13(ANI): She might have sold 41 million albums and topped the charts with 13 No. 1 singles, but Rihanna recently admitted that she feels unsafe in success.*
Washington D.C., Oct. 13(ANI): She might have sold 41 million albums and topped the charts with 13 No. 1 singles, but Rihanna recently admitted that she feels unsafe in success. The 27-year-old songstress said in a recent interview that she used to feel unsafe right in the moment of an accomplishment, which made her feel that the ground will fall from under her feet, reports Us magazine. The 'Diamonds' hit-maker added that even now when everyone is celebrating she hops on to the next thing because she doesn't want to get lost in the big cushion of success. (ANI) Â»
